\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class functions as a wrapper around any class that provides the necessary functionality for a zip archive. 

This class works by applying \textquotesingle{}type erasure\textquotesingle{}. This enables the use of objects of any class, the only requirement being that it provides the right interface. No inheritance from a base class is needed.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
This method is deliberately not marked \textquotesingle{}explicit\textquotesingle{}, because as a templated constructor, it should be able to take any type as an argument. However, only objects that satisfy the required interface can be used.
